entry.title: WIND WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: SE 19 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then to 70 gusting to 110 this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 110 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
